text: Ate jadom musa ne apani kauma nu kiha, he meri kauma! Tusi vache nu raba bana ke apane apa te bhari zulama kita hai. Huna apane haida karana vale vala apana dhi'ana karo ate apane aparadhi'am di apane hatham nala hati'a karo iha tuhade la'i tuhade paida karana vale anusara caga hai, tam alaha ne tuhadi tauba (khima jacana) savikara kiti. Besaka uha bhari tauba savikara karana vala, bahuta rahimata vala hai
